website_summaries.verdict: Your best option if you're looking for a nitric oxide supplement that doesn't require you to swallow a handful of pills.
pros: Comes with a 60-day money-back guarantee if you don't like the results
Supports a healthy metabolism and endurance
cons: A few users have reported minor gastrointestinal distress after taking

website_summaries.verdict: L-Arginine supplement in capsule form with a money-back guarantee behind its results.
pros: Overwhelmingly favored by buyers, this product is manufactured in accordance with GMP standards, in an FDA-registered facility, and third-party tested for quality
cons: As with all nutritional supplements, a percentage of users saw little or no benefit
For this product, it was just a small percentage

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be advise - dosages are lower than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Buyer be advised. I admit, this is my mistake as I did not read the fine print in the images. The product is advertised as "1200mg", but the serving size is 2 capsules delivering 400mg .. much lower than I expected which makes the product over priced.
customer_reviews.author: MLR

customer_reviews.title: Great service! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading a few reviews to give me that boost for my workouts. I took them over the weekend to get into my system working on the house. I had energy all day but not that jittery feeling that I hate getting. I worked out this week with more drive and energy when I got home. Noticing a much better pump. A no quit energy and woke up like an 18 yr old boy again.. Wink Wink.. The service was great, quick and sent exactly what was described. Also these don't break the bank like some do. I'll be shopping there from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Bret C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Being a college student, I have accumulated tons of stress and lack sleep. Havasu's L-Arginine does not compare to other brands on the shelf. This product has noticeably balanced my hormone levels and has given me a natural, much-needed boost of energy. I sale results within the first 2 weeks of use. I highly recommend users to at least give this product a try and you will be pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pacifico

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for workouts!
customer_reviews.text: This reminds me of a supplement I used to use called NO Explode. It's fantastic! It adds nitrous oxide to your bloodstream which has allowed me to workout harder for longer. I definitely recommend to those who are hitting a plateau in their workouts and want to get over the hump. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: A1 Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product & the results really speaks for itself. My comment is more so regarding the integrity of the integrity of the brand itself. I recently ordered the Extra Strength L Arginine & was excited to try out this product. Initially I was sent accidentally sent the wrong product. I contacted Havasu's Customer Care Team & they quickly responded. They went above the call of duty to rectify the issue by expediently sending me the correct product & also extending a generous discount off of my next order due to the inconvenience. Having a great product is awesome but also having outstanding customer service to match it is Excellence!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbrowski

customer_reviews.title: I really like this version of L-Arginine
customer_reviews.text: I really like this version of L-Arginine. I take it 30 minutes before working out and you can tell a difference when you do. The extra NO it releases does cross over the hormone barrier and release the N-HGH or Natural Human Growth Hormone you produce in your body at the pituitary gland. No you cannot feel the N-HGH coursing through your body but you can feel the difference in your workouts though when the NO (Nitrous Oxide) starts running around in your body to the muscles you are working during that particular workout. Very good price so you get your money's worth by far with this product. I will be buying it again too.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J.

customer_reviews.title: Great energy during workouts
customer_reviews.text: I 100% noticed a difference in my workouts after I started to use this product. I was able to keep my endurance up throughout the entire workout. It is a manageable size pill and an easy supplement to add to your daily intake if you're looking for a good endurance and energy increase.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Bad bottle, smelled awful.
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this brand (and product) for awhile now without any problems. Opened a new bottle today, and the color and smell are off. Missed the return window, so now it's trash. Top pill is the color I always receive, bottom is the one I opened today. Very disappointed in this. I'm going to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: I Feel Nothing and I think I know Why...
customer_reviews.text: So far I feel nothing and I think I know why there are glowing reviews. When you get your product there is a sticker that says "Get a Free Bottle" This is, of course, to get people to leave glowing reviews in exchange for free products. Amazon should crack down on this practice so people stop wasting money on products that don't seem to work. Save your money or try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the purpose of buying L-arginine was to have a better workout performance
customer_reviews.text: Hi, This is my 2nd bottle and I normally do exercise 3 times/wk (I am 45), the purpose of buying L-arginine was to have a better workout performance, but even when the dosage is 2 pills/day, I was cautious and just take 1/day then after 3 days I start feeling the results because even when it was not the purpose I was ready for sex anytime. It is working good for me.

customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I expected there to be 1200 mg of L Arginine but there is only 400 mg plus other stuff. The description is misleading.

And it doesn't give you that crazy pre work out shakes, your body just feels like your able to step it up a notch. Stuff works amazing I have used two bottles.

Hard to explain but I just feel happier, more energetic and my strength in the gym has gone up for certain. I’m also a runner and My breathing has been better on my faster runs. It’s working great for me and have already ordered a second bottle so I don’t run out.

Would be better If I bight a game or movie, or burned the money.Don`t do it.If you want to try these products make sure a friend you trust is telling you it worked.

customer_reviews.title: I can definitely tell a difference.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best NO supplement on the market. Havasu sets itself apart from other brands. (& No, I do not work for the company) Most NO supplements have a recommended dosage of 3-4 giant horse pills, and they have to be taken on an empty stomach. Havasu's serving is just 2 medium-sized capsules, take with a meal. They've added Grape Seed Extract, which helps the body's mechanism to convert the L-Arginine and L-Citrulline into Nitric Oxide, and Cayenne Pepper to increase absorption. Works Great for the gym...and the bedroom. Will definitely buy again.

I researched that l-arginine could help to lower blood pressure. After a month on l-arginine, I was able to get my blood pressure back to normal. The 2nd reason, I was have had absolutely no energy lately and have been struggling with workouts that use to be a breeze. This gives me a little boost I need to get through them.

I've taken lots of pre-sups before and all of them make you feel some sort of way but this is the first time I've experienced a headache/migraine. It's now six hours since ingestion and I still have a headache. To top it all off, I didn't feel any difference in my workout besides having a headache. This product is all hype and a complete waste of money for me.

Furthermore, my stamina and energy levels are up, my focus is improved, I'm calmer and relaxed prior to and during intimacy. The plus is that I can repeat performance several times a day if needed. customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the arginine product for nearly a year now and finally decided to give some feedback. I love this. I’ve tried lots of other L-arginine products on Amazon and from GNC, Walgreens. This stuff is the best for me. Lots of energy, great blood flow. I FEEL the effect of this product, which is a major difference. Great energy and muscle size. I would recommend this to anyone looking to try an arginine product. I plan to continue to use this particular product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product really helps me with my coronary artery disease. I've been using nitric oxide for 8 or 9 years and my episodes and hospital visits decreased over the years. I'm still using the prescribed medication too, but the nitric oxide supplement really helps my blood flow. This particular product works really well and is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: mca

customer_reviews.title: Dosing way too low.
customer_reviews.text: Dosing is way to low to be considered extra strength. Not alot for your money. Much better bang for your $ with other N.O. supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Positive
customer_reviews.text: The reason I decided to try the L-Arginine, Extra Strength, with Nitric Oxide Booster was to help my circulation. It does help that, but I really like to take it because it makes me feel a little more energetic. I take 2 in the morning. Sometimes in the afternoon, when I feel a little tired, I will take two and it gives me the energy i need to make it through to bedtime. It’s a healthy overall health and energy supplement. No side effects, no bad smell or taste. It’s was with a try, especially with a money back guarantee. Now I need to order my next bottle.
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoMom

customer_reviews.title: This product IS great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bottle that I’ve been ordering. This product is real, (I am not a professional medical person to talk about how it works medically) but I like this product for my gym and good energy throughout my day. Not to mention it does work in bed as well. Took 2 of them an hour before the gym and really worked great. I just didn’t want to stop work out after 2 hours. Give it a try and you’ll like it.
customer_reviews.author: sahd

customer_reviews.title: Worked to help me lower blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. My Doctor recommended l-arginine to help with some early hypertension. This product had great reviews so I tried and found the quality was excellent. Over the last year, my blood pressure has dropped out of hypertensive range and this product is one of the contributors to that result.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about three weeks now and I am seeing a difference in my endurance during my workouts. I'm also seeing a slight difference in the bedroom in terms of stamina and fullness, my girlfriend doesn't seem to mind. Overall I'm satisfied with the product and the customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Russell

customer_reviews.title: Helping my blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: I been suffering from high blood pressure, anxiety, panic attacks, high cholesterol, blood pressure around 145/99 - 150/100 constantly and that’s on blood pressure medication, now after 2 weeks on l Argenine my blood pressure readings are 124/77- 120/74 I can say it definitely helps with blood pressure and I can also see a increase in vain size in my hands , will continue to use this product so far with 2 weeks of use it’s going great .
customer_reviews.author: Ubaldo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A great supplement to help get you moving
customer_reviews.text: This supplement has made a huge difference in how I start my day. I used to feel tired, and drag through the morning. I found that with taking this supplement I have a nice boost in my energy, and am getting up easier and earlier, and having energy to do more of what I want throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Longer, harder workouts! Can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this optimistically. I took as directed for ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this optimistically. I took as directed for a week, saw no change, so I doubled the dose. Took two capsules in the morning and two before my workout. No noticed difference
customer_reviews.author: M.T.E.

customer_reviews.title: Placebo affect ?
customer_reviews.text: Recently tried this brand, normally get L- Argenine from Walgreens which I can endorse. Not sure if it’s me, but I don’t feel anything different. It’s pissible because these are capsule and the other ones are large white pills. It would be interesting to test actual ingredients ... l . Argenine is one of the small amount of Vitamins a choose to take.. I just didn’t notice a change, over past few months I would say decrease in sex drive, I’m hoping the normal Walgreens brand I was taking religiously prior to me trying these helps as well as it did in past.. nothing great to say ... wish I had better news:(
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hofstein

customer_reviews.title: Don't false advertise!
customer_reviews.text: I used the product and liked it! They had a get a free bottle coupon on the lid. So I tried to receive a free bottle, but they gave me the run around! I found another product of theirs I wanted to try, but I probably won't! They can't back their own coupons. I don't think you would want to have them on your best seller list anymore! Something's not right!!! Check it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Gary, from Houston.

customer_reviews.title: Dried out/discolored
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend ordering from here. Got these and they’re all clumpy and seem old/dried out like they haven’t been stored correctly. They’re also discolored. I had a container previously that I ordered from bodybuilding.com and they were a light tan. These are dark brown/pink with white specs. Needless to say these will be trashed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after reading some reviews to help boost my energy level,lean muscle and improve my nitric oxide blood flow. I’ve been taking it for about three weeks. I started with one pill the first few days now I take two after eating breakfast, so far so good I’ve noticed I have increased energy I’m less forgetful and I’m more focused throughout the day and I don’t have that jittery feeling.
customer_reviews.author: bernard

customer_reviews.title: Effective specially in this times.
customer_reviews.text: I like this supplement, it boost my energy to last all day at work. It aides my stamina to last the day and still got energy to do stuffs when I got home. Overall, In my age of 45, I know my stamina and energy was not like in my younger years. Specially in this pandemic time, this supplement helps me get through stress and anxiety. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Ggatch

customer_reviews.title: Return to an old friend
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before for energy to get through my work week and I actually got that plus more endurance with my workouts. I would feel like fatigue after a workout, less soreness, and my cardio sessions were a lot better. I'm back on because I'm trying to get better cardio sessions in so I can get 3 miles under 30 minutes. Yes some reading this are going to laugh, but I struggle with distance running and I want to do a half marathon in the next year or so and I think this will be very beneficial to me.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTON

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Took me forever to find an arginine supplement with actual citrulline malate that wasn't an arm and a leg. This stuff is legit.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Low-Cost Version, BEWARE OF FREE OFFER
customer_reviews.text: A lower-priced version of a Nitric Oxide booster. You can feel a little difference when you work out, but not compared to different products. Beware the "free bottle" promo scam. For some reason, the Amazon order is ALWAYS invalid. Sticking with Jacked Factory products.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Biehl

customer_reviews.title: Better recovery time
customer_reviews.text: I began using the L-Arginine and Horny Goat Weed the same day. Within a week I was noticing noticibly very strong erections, frequent morning wood etc. I'm almost 44 years old. I also play regular full court basketball. What I noticed there was less soreness after. I'm more able to play back to back days because I'm not as sore and tired from the previous day. All in all I've felt no negative side effects and just feel better overall.
customer_reviews.author: Dustyjasper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product L-Arginine extra strength. I take 2 tablets daily. I have noticed an enormous increase in energy an overall vitality. My morning workouts are more productive and I do more reps and feel better afterwards. I highly recommend and I started to feel the difference after the third day. This supplement will definitely increase your endurance amd stamina in all aspects of your daily routines.
customer_reviews.author: Jay H

customer_reviews.title: it Worths
customer_reviews.text: work and study and at the end of the day I'm usually crap. After I started taking this supplement I have more energy. That's why I ordered a second bottle. I highly recommend for extra strength and better energy levels. I just wish there were more pills in the bottle. I use 3 a day. I'm 6.2 and 200 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Al Pacino

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very familiar with diet pills and I have never had a product effect me the way this one does. 30 minutes after taking this product it has the effects of a sleeping pill! I also had a reaction last night from them, I nearly passed out. I have taken this product and tossed it in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor'd Tots & More

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the benefits of this product necessarily. I stopped taking it after less than a week because I developed a weird rash on my arms. I went to the dermatologist and eventually realized that L-Arginine was the cause. I learned that in some cases the nitric oxide in L-Arginine can cause skin irritation, rashes, and/or hives. Within two days of stopping taking it, the rash began to clear up. I assume this is an uncommon side effect. However, it does happen. So, just a word to the wise.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Strong Boners!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my late 40's.. sometimes I need a little extra help with a strong erection. I dont think I need to take ED pills regularly but once in awhile, I was getting the limp noodle. I did some research and decided to give L Arginine a try. Well, I'm on my 4th bottle and I'm very pleased.. and so is my fiance who's 8 years younger.. now, I need to shop for a new mattress and bed frame!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Carter

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for evening workouts when I don’t want to take a pre-workout energy drink that would keep me up. Feel it does help then again might be placebo either way I get a better work out.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerUSA1

customer_reviews.title: Good at the moment
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I am writing this review to receive a free bottle of the product. I’ve been taking this product for about a week now. I honestly can’t say anything yet whether or not it is actually making a difference, but I do not have anything bad to say. I have noticed a slight increase in vascularity at the gym, but who knows if it’s just my mind playing tricks on me. I’ve taken arginine before and have had good success with it. I’ll update this review in a month once it’s built up in my system.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Whatley

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, by reputation... 5 stars by efficiency??
customer_reviews.text: I have been prescribed a arginine product. But my new doctor recommends me a stronger Arginine product which unfortunately is not further in the the market. As I had good experience with Elderberry Gummies 100mg Supports Immune System Health (purchase on April 19), I decided to try L-Arginine from Havasu, after favourable opinion by my doctor I started using it today and I will come and adjust my review in few days. I appreciated on time delivery, The product is well presented
customer_reviews.author: R-man

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking and trying different products that will boost my energy while at the gym, and also possibly increase my desire for intimacy. So far this has been the best product I’ve found and with no side effects. I’ve been taking it as directed on the bottle and my energy has improved significantly. My intimate time has also improved and became a lot more fun! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time using this product, I started taking it about a month ago. I started to notice a gradule increase in my stamina and energy by about week 2. By week 3 I felt like my blood flow was better as I noticed a little better response from downstairs in the bedroom department. I'm thinking I'd like to try it out for another month see how it goes. So far I'm very satisfied. Michelangelo L.
customer_reviews.author: Strikemonster

product_meta.title: Havasu Nutrition Extra Strength L Arginine - 1200mg Nitric Oxide Supplement for Muscle Growth, Vascularity and Energy - L-Citrulline & Essential Amino Acids to Support Physical Endurance, 60 Capsules
feature_bullets: NITRIC OXIDE IN A NUTSHELL. Nitric oxide may sound like something a mad scientist would create, but it's actually a naturally occurring molecule your body needs! Automatically, your body converts the amino acid Arginine, found in our L-Arginine and L-Citrulline ingredient combination, into a benefit-packed nitric oxide.

A TINY MOLECULE WITH A BIG JOB. We know just how important it is to take care of your vital organs, which is why our arginine supplement is specially formulated for better overall blood circulation.* Each nitric oxide molecule works to relax your blood vessels so that oxygen can flow more freely throughout your body.*

SAY YES TO "NO2": Our customers can't get enough of our nitric oxide supplements, join them in saying yes to all-day energy, increased physical endurance, better post-workout muscle recovery, and overall improved blood circulation from head to toe.*

MUSCLE BUILDER FOR MEN AND WOMEN. With age and stress, we know it can be hard to get past your fitness plateau. Our nitric oxide booster supplements can help give you the endurance you need to workout harder and longer, so that you can see improved muscle growth and vascularity quicker.*

BENEFITS BEYOND THE GYM. Our nitrous oxide supplements for men and women, will provide you with all of the full-body benefits that increased oxygen has to offer. Our supplements are formulated with the most effective natural ingredients at the perfect doses because your overall health and wellness is our priority.
